A Legacy of Service, A Future of Excellence

Discover the heart and soul behind Surya Nursing Educational College.

OUR FOUNDER

The Vision of Dr. Vijay Kumar

Dr. Vijay Kumar, M.S., a well-acclaimed surgeon and known philanthropist, is the driving force behind our institution. After a distinguished career in government service, he recognized a critical need for high-quality healthcare and accessible medical education in the Santhal Pargana region.

Driven by a philosophy of service and an uncompromising commitment to quality, he left his job to establish a series of healthcare institutions. This journey began with Surya Nursing Home in 1995 and culminated in the establishment of Surya Nursing Educational College in 2023, creating a complete ecosystem for health and education in Sahibganj.

Our Guiding Principles

Our mission is what we do. Our vision is why we do it.

visibility

Our Vision

To develop a centre for excellence in nursing which provides an evidence-based, quality educational program and encourages innovation to improve patient care for our community and beyond.

rocket_launch

Our Mission

To provide comprehensive and modern educational facilities, including smart classrooms, advanced labs, and a rich library, all within a sprawling 5.5-acre campus designed to foster learning, development, and character building as per INC guidelines.

A Campus Built for Success

Our 60,000 sq. ft. of built-up area is thoughtfully designed to provide an immersive and effective learning environment.

Smart Classrooms

Equipped with the latest audio-visual technology to make learning interactive and engaging.

Advanced Laboratories

Hands-on training in our specialized labs for fundamentals, community health, nutrition, and more.

Ultra-Rich Library

A comprehensive collection of textbooks, journals, and digital resources to support academic pursuits.

Our Core Values

The principles that guide every decision we make.

star

Excellence

We strive for the highest standards in education and patient care.

favorite

Compassion

We believe empathy and kindness are at the heart of nursing.

shield

Integrity

We are committed to ethical and honest practices in all that we do.

groups

Community

We are dedicated to improving the health and well-being of Sahibganj.
